lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic met with former women's tennis greats Billie Jean King and Chris Evert on Wednesday to hear their thoughts about equal prize money, and backpedaled on his controversial comments Sunday after his tournament victory at Indian Wells.
snippet: Novak Djokovic met with former women's tennis greats Billie Jean King and Chris Evert on Wednesday to hear their thoughts about equal prize money, and backpedaled on his controversial comments Sunday after his tournament victory at Indian Wells....

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Meets With Billie Jean King, Chris Evert
headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic Meets With Billie Jean King, Chris Evert
